attributes.action: Pay off the national debt with small change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to set up local collection centres for everyone to take their coppers, 5p, 10p and 20p pieices collected in jars etc so this money can be saved and 'ring fenced' to help pay off our national debt for the good of the nation!  Most of us have hordes of coins which when times are bad take to one of those machines in found in supermarkets in exchange for a voucher which can be redeemed for cash.  Well times are hard for this country so lets pull together our resources and make our change work for the good of us all!  I think this country could be sitting on a gold(copper) mine!
